news.title: LIC Housing Finance's net profit declines 2.55% in Q3 FY26
news.para: LIC Housing Finance saw its net profit dip by 2.55 percent in the quarter ending December 31, 2025. Despite this, total income rose by 2.04 percent. The company noted sequential improvement in margins and asset quality. Disbursements for individual home loans and non-housing loans increased.

news.title: Noida: No OTS extension, 7,200 plot allottees face recovery from March 2026
news.para: Yamuna Expressway Authority rejects deadline extension for its one-time settlement scheme, pushing 7,200 defaulters towards recovery action by February 28.  In other decisions, six acres are allocated for a chief minister's school, and progress on stalled projects involving 6,800 homebuyers is noted. Master plans for Agra Urban City and Raya Heritage City are also moving forward.

news.title: Confident Group's founder shoots himself during I-T searches in Bengaluru
news.para: C J Roy, the esteemed chairman of Confident Group, died by suicide on Friday afternoon at his office, confirmed by Bengaluru Police, who stated he shot himself. This tragic incident occurred amid an ongoing three-day Income Tax search, with Roy's brother alleging that he faced intense pressure from federal agents.

news.title: Punjab & Haryana HC panel to measure width of roads after PIL filed against S+4 floor policy
news.para: The Punjab and Haryana High Court has ordered a physical inspection of internal roads in Gurugram's residential sectors. A three-member panel will verify road widths and conditions. This comes after a Public Interest Litigation challenged the state's stilt-plus-four construction policy. The court needs to establish facts on the ground.

news.title: Hong Kong’s luxury housing market sees rising interest with renewed city buzz
news.para: Hong Kong's housing market is showing signs of a robust comeback, with home prices experiencing their first annual increase in four years.

news.title: ED files supplementary prosecution complaint against Unnati Fortune Holdings in PMLA case
news.para: Enforcement Directorate's Lucknow office has filed a supplementary complaint against Unnati Fortune Holdings Ltd and its directors for alleged money laundering.  Investigations, stemming from UP Police FIRs, revealed diversion of around Rs126 crore by promoter Anil Mithas, who is in judicial custody.  Assets worth Rs126 crore have been attached.

news.title: Mortgage approvals in UK fall to lowest since June 2024, BoE data shows
news.para: In December, mortgage approvals in Britain plummeted to their lowest point in 18 months, sparking worries about the swift restoration of the housing market. Despite this setback, house prices experienced modest yearly increases, while indicators hint at a resurgence in buyer sentiment.

news.title: Eldeco Infrastructure and Properties gets Sebi's nod to float IPO
news.para: Haryana-based real estate developer Eldeco Infrastructure and Properties Ltd proposed public issue is a mix of fresh issues of shares worth Rs 800 crore and an offer for sale up to Rs 200 crore by promoters.

news.title: FIR lodged against builder, project head over open waterlogged pit in Greater Noida
news.para: A serious complaint has emerged in Greater Noida, where police have initiated legal action against a builder and his lead project supervisor. These individuals are accused of creating a dangerous situation by leaving an open pit brimming with contaminated water close to a busy public road.

news.title: If firm profits more from its scale, it has to bear more responsibility for environmental costs: SC
news.para: The Supreme Court has underscored the importance of environmental stewardship, imposing a hefty Rs 5 crore fine on a construction firm for breaching eco-friendly regulations. The court highlighted that larger corporations, which disproportionately benefit from their extensive operations, bear a heightened duty to mitigate their environmental impact.

news.title: London developers are snapping up empty airspace above rooftops
news.para: This trend, already established in cities like New York, presents economic advantages for developers but faces local opposition.

news.title: Gurugram properties registered despite prohibition; revenue officials under scanner
news.para: Revenue officials in Gurugram are under scrutiny for allegedly ignoring directives from the Town and Country Planning Department. Reports indicate that property registrations, including those of the Bristol Hotel-cum-commercial complex on MG Road, were processed despite explicit order prohibitions.

news.title: WeWork India to add 3,300 desks in Hyderabad; plans ₹100 crore investment
news.para: WeWork India will add 2,50,348 sq ft of space, in Hyderabad creating approximately 3,300 new desks. This expansion is expected to be operational by June 2026. The investment for this growth is around ₹100 crore.

news.title: Arisinfra Solutions posts net profit of ₹18.26 crore in Q3 FY26
news.para: Arisinfra Solutions announced strong financial results for the quarter ending December 31, 2025. Net profit surged to ₹18.26 crore from ₹2.04 crore last year. Total income rose by 46.83 percent to ₹272.48 crore. The company is also exploring the asphalt market through a partnership with JS Infra Solutions.

news.title: Aadhar Housing Finance's net profit rises 17.49% in Q3 FY26
news.para: Aadhar Housing Finance's net profit saw an increase of 17.49 percent for the quarter ending December 31, 2025. Total income also rose by 18.32 percent. Assets under management reached ₹28,790 crore, showing a 20 percent year-on-year growth.

news.title: Nila Spaces' net profit up 118.45% in Q3 FY26
news.para: Nila Spaces announced a 118.45 percent jump in its net consolidated profit for the quarter ending December 31, 2025. The company's profit after tax reached ₹8.17 crore. Total income also saw a rise of 58.28 percent. The company also acquired AIt DRX India, a digital real estate marketplace, for ₹6.03 crore.

news.title: Ambuja Cements' net profit falls 86.22% in Q3 FY26
news.para: Ambuja Cements, a subsidiary of the Adani Group, reported a staggering 86.22% decline in net profit for Q4 2025. While total income reflected a slight decrease, the company is diligently working on reducing costs, focusing on enhancing power and fuel efficiency.

news.title: Brigade Enterprises' net profit dips 12.61% in Q3 FY26
news.para: Brigade Enterprises saw its net profit drop by 12.61 percent in the quarter ending December 31, 2025. The company recorded net bookings of 1.33 million square feet in its real estate segment. A new land parcel was acquired in Secunderabad for a residential project.

news.title: Housing department gets nod to implement Uttar Pradesh redevelopment plan
news.para: The Uttar Pradesh government has approved a redevelopment policy to unlock prime urban land parcels. This policy will guide housing development authorities in processing private player applications for building redevelopment, addressing underutilization due to disputes, poverty, and degeneration. The government also plans to revise development fees to promote urbanisation and affordability.

news.title: Aadhaar authentication a must for property registrations in Belagavi now
news.para: Belagavi DC Mohammad Roshan has mandated Aadhaar authentication for all property registrations to combat a large-scale racket involving duplicate Aadhaar numbers used for fraudulent transactions. This directive follows a report exposing impersonation and illegal property transfers, prompting the formation of a joint task force to investigate the misuse of identity documents.
